website_summaries.verdict: Mop allows you to clean your floors without chemicals.
pros: Pad can be cleaned in your washing machine
The handle on this mop telescopes to length
Extra mop heads available for purchase
cons: Sometimes the telescoping handle is difficult to operate

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on a real dust mop
customer_reviews.text: For $20 you'd expect the quality to be better. The telescoping handle is TRASH it doesn't stay extended and is made of really cheap aluminum. It feels like I could snap it in half with barely any force. The mop equally bad, I mopped the house once and it's coming apart at the seams. I honestly feel I could have purchased this at a dollar store. I am going to be returning this product ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: Davey Boy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed handle; did not receive a full refund upon return of defective item.
customer_reviews.text: The handle would not lock at all no matter how hard I twisted it. I almost bent it in the process and finally gave up. When I requested to return it as a defective item, O-Cedar would not refund the entire purchase price, only partial, and I was not able to return the extra refill I purchased. Will not be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dry mop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, easy way to clean hard floors (linoleum, wood, tile.) A dry mop that removes dust, dirt, and hair more efficiently than sweeping. Hair sticks to this and unlike sweeping, it doesn't just move the dirt/dust around. Once I was done cleaning my large kitchen and tiny bathroom, I just shook out the debris over the outdoor trash can. Works great and definitely more cost-effective than a Swiffer vacuum and more maneuverable than my Dyson vacuum cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: K Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Stitching ripped after 3 washes
customer_reviews.text: Was working great, but now the stitches are coming apart after only 3 uses and washes in the washing machine as directed. The thread along one of the blue microfiber edges is completely open. Doesn’t look like it will last 100 washes :(
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Throw away your sponge/wringer mop.
customer_reviews.text: We have wood floors and find that for general damp-mopping this is the BOMB! SOO much faster, no need for a bucket, even though the mop covers a large area quickly, it is very easy to maneuver into corners and tight places.
customer_reviews.author: Tom B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I have recently moved into a home with laminate floors. This really works well on them as it picks up small particles easily. It glides smoothly and reaches under and behind furniture easily. It is the best dust mop I've used in my many years.
customer_reviews.author: Susann E. DeViney

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect, telescoping wand means that barely 5 foot me ...
customer_reviews.text: Just perfect, telescoping wand means that barely 5 foot me is not dealing with a 6 foot wand . Already ordered the 2 pack replacement pads, I have 2 dogs and a long haired cat, this picks up everything! So much better than a broom.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not as great as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product delivery time was short and it was well packaged. I didn’t have any problem setting up the telescoping handle, which worked perfectly. I am a bit unhappy with the product because I thought the dry part would pick up dust, hair and debris a bit better than it does. Also it keeps flipping over when I use it. I haven’t figured out how to keep that from occurring. So for now it is unconfortable to use because of that. My expectations have not been met and would not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Unusable
customer_reviews.text: I honestly feel bad giving this one star because I can’t attest to how the product actually works but one star it is because it arrived broken. It didn’t seem broken, looked perfect condition upon opening but when I tried to lock the handle, it wouldn’t. I tried everything even my husband did and there was no way this thing was locking. Without the handle locking, it’s impossible to even use. Unfortunately I had to return...
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Therese

customer_reviews.title: This does a great job on my hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job on my hardwoods, I have several dogs so there is always hair dropping. I used t hos once a day between house cleaning and it really works well
customer_reviews.author: Shibas1

customer_reviews.title: Very very convenient
customer_reviews.text: Not for really big messes, but for maintenance, it is a life saver. Originally bought 2 of these for the vet clinic I was a technician at, saved us so much time and made cleaning up between appointments a quick breeze. We were constantly swapping heads and tossing them in wash due to the heavy dirt a vet clinic builds, and it was extremely convenient to just swap and wash as needed and the heads out lasted me at the clinic. Dry mop with the floofy side, then spray the floor and scrub with the flat side. Works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Calaway

customer_reviews.title: Useful and Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: This mop took a little getting used to, but it works well, flips over and is easy to handle. We use it to sweep the kitchen area after a meal.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Calabrese, Indie Author

customer_reviews.title: Decent but nothing too special
customer_reviews.text: Nice mop/broom; collects dust and hair off my hard wood floors pretty well. If I go too long between sweeps, though, it’s no better than a regular broom. It’s best for really frequent light sweeping. One major complaint is that although the head snaps into place along the pole for storage, it doesn’t snap into place facing up or down to sweep. This means every time you pick it up from the floor the head sort of flops around, potentially spreading dust as you try to get the right side back on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sharon Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Mop clings onto dog fur
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 dogs and that means fur around the house. The blue fingers on this mop grab onto the fur and hold onto it until I brush it off in the wastebasket with a small brush. lt is light weight, maneuvers easily and the the head is easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: NM Norma

customer_reviews.title: Make cleaning easy again.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product after seeing it at my sister's house and used it a few times on her hardwood floor. We liked it so much that we bought one for our home and one for my mother-in-law's home. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: S. So

customer_reviews.title: This is a Great Mop!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this mop, it was just used today to dust ceilings and walls with the terry side and the microfiber is great on my floors. Then you just vacuum it off till it needs washing, and I wash with all other rag towels and always hang to dry, also Never use fabric softner as it will ruin the mop. I highly recommend this mop!!
customer_reviews.author: Beth from Sarasota Fl.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this flip mop for dust mopping the floor dry, or for using with cleaner to wet mop floors. I have several refills because dogs are pretty hairy. Just throw the refills into the washer in hot water to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleaning Implement
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. I had a little trouble with the telescopic handle at first, but finally figured it out. Love that's it is a duster on one side and a cleaner on the flip side. I have already ordered replacement pads so I will have clean ones all the time. I would definitely order this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Georgie

customer_reviews.title: Handle issues
customer_reviews.text: So I read other customers Questions and answers because I had a really hard time getting the handle to telescope. You really have to turn it to the left or toward yourself and it twists at the base. Once I got that figured out it’s a great mop it stays telescoped an extended really picks up a lot of dust on my hardwoods.
customer_reviews.author: hopesenuf

customer_reviews.title: usually when a product or service is exceptionally bad or good
customer_reviews.text: I only occasionally leave reviews, usually when a product or service is exceptionally bad or good. This OCedar flip mop works like a dream on our hardwood floors. Very easy to maneuver around furniture and picks up most everything in its path. Cut my floor cleaning time to a small fraction of what I used previously. Quality reusable microfiber cloths are great!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Royall

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than it seems and cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. This looked so much like one my son in law had purchased at Lowe’s, and I thought I was getting similar size and quality. Instead, I feel like I was overcharged for junk. It is cheaply made, doesn’t work well at all, and much smaller than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: I think too much...😊

customer_reviews.title: Highly Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I contemplated buying because of several mixed reviews, but decided to try my luck. I'm very happy with this mop as it's exactly as advertised. It's simple, durable, and easy to use. I love the easy flip feature for different types of cleaning. Just what I was looking for and a great price! I highly recommend this mop!
customer_reviews.author: chickenwing

customer_reviews.title: Picks up what a broom won’t!
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for sweeping hard floors. I haven’t used wet yet so I can’t comment on that but yet. But I always use it. After I sweep, I usually just take the mini vac and vacuum the dust off the microfiber side. That way I can use a few times before taking the pad off and washing. It picks up everything a broom can’t and swivels with ease! I’ve already gotten a second one for upstairs and got my sis to get one. She loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Lacaisa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Will not find a better dust mop.
customer_reviews.text: This a great mop. I was a bit hesitate about it reachinng under my dressers. Not a problem! it picks up every piece of dust, dirt an even small pieces of paper. Even animal hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Yeah! Dust bunnies eliminated!
customer_reviews.text: This works so much better than a swifter. I have dark floors and under bed, the swifter just pushes dust. This with all the blue loops picks up the dust! Yeah!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: NON telescoping handle!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the telescoping handle would not extend. That makes it unusable. Shoddy product from a recognized name.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Anne Wade

customer_reviews.title: Worth its' weight in gold if you have animals.
customer_reviews.text: This works so well on my hardwood and Pergo floors. My dog sheds so much. 3 X as fast as a swiffer
customer_reviews.author: PeneP2

customer_reviews.title: O-Cedar Dual-Action
customer_reviews.text: This does a good job on my engineered floors, quickly and easily. Works much better than vacuuming because it gets behind and under where the vacuum can't reach. Unlike other reviewers, my handle works well so far. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ekay

customer_reviews.title: Hardwood floor dream
customer_reviews.text: Love the size, two sided design, ease of use. Having an older home with hardwood floors has become easier to keep clean daily with constant pet hairs. I'm in love with this product.
customer_reviews.author: rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would of read the reviews on this before I bought. I usually do but it looked like it'd be pretty good. Wrong!! It's not worth the money and is a pain. The dust mop I had from the dollar store was better. This one is hard to maneuver and the handle is a pain to get longer and get it to stay there. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Floppy
customer_reviews.text: This mop/broom is so wabbly, it is impossible to sweep with it. It is constantly flopping every time I pull back to sweep. I tried to see if there is a way to tighten it, but could not find one.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Screw handle into place.
customer_reviews.text: Some reviews say that handle does not stay extended. You must screws it into place. Seems to take a little muscle but once done it stays.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty watty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Luxury Vinyl Plank flooring!
customer_reviews.text: This adjustable mop with flip over cover for dusting/cleaning is perfect for my new LVP (luxury vinyl plank) flooring. I read some reviews that said mop handle was hard to adjust. It could not be any easier- just twist extend or retract- twist to hold in place. I damp mopped-it dried fast. I don’t see any streaking. Covers are easy to replace. Have not washed them yet to see how well they do but so far I am very happy with my purchase. Fast shipping, well packaged. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Essential for tile and hardwood
customer_reviews.text: Man this thing works great. Even when you think your floor is not bad run this guy around for a couple minutes and you’ll be like woah. The best part is no replacement pads to buy and no washing. Just lay it flat and run your vacuum over the pad and it’s brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Better than before.
customer_reviews.text: Terrific mop heads that are very absorbent and leave floor surface practically dry. The new telescoping handle is a very useful improvement making the mop comfortable for any height person.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact the head is very maneuverable making it easy to change direction from floors, to baseboards and around and under furniture when mopping. It’s also it’s very lightweight too.
customer_reviews.author: Mamabirdie

customer_reviews.title: Cleaned very well!
customer_reviews.text: I have terrible back issues and this mop worked great!! The adjustment worked and held nicely. The mop itself really picked up the hair and dander from my 3 dogs and cat and I used the wet mop side and it cleaned up very well. Would definitely say this is a good product to buy.
customer_reviews.author: K Smoot

customer_reviews.title: I would have given it 5 stars but the handle ...
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but the handle won’t lock in the extended position. Nothing a little duct tape won’t fix though. Cleans very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picks up dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a German shepherd that sheds CONSTANTLY and leave clumps of hair all over my laminate floors. This has been great. I vacuum once a week and use this every morning and the floors look so much better!
customer_reviews.author: LauraAshley

customer_reviews.title: This thing mops
customer_reviews.text: Never felt better being barefoot in the kitchen, once over with the fuzzy side then again with the flat side and you're done. Haven't tried washing the pad yet but happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Best dust mop
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. Grabs dust in corners and keeps it until you take the pad off and shake it, or wash it. Great for quick cleaning instead of getting out the vacuum and then washing the floor. Love it!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Szczecina

customer_reviews.title: New floors,  new cleaning stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Just put down new vinyl plank floors and this picks up all the dust and debris so easy compared to regular sweeping with a broom. I have ridges in my floor to mimic grains in wood. Easy to clean as you throw it in the washer and drip dry. Definitely recommend to buy the extra pads for this mop as you need to switch out while you wash one!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Vanderhoef

customer_reviews.title: Great dual mop
customer_reviews.text: This mop is very handy and easily switches from one side to the other. You will like this mop. I hate to clean, but this does make it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Kara's Gram

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: It flips over on me a lot and only cleans so so. I'm disappointed but have to use it until I find something better for all my new vinyl plank flooring.
customer_reviews.author: Dale S.

customer_reviews.title: This looks good and works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review only after 1st use as didn’t want to write anything just based on looks. I thought the first time I would wet it, it might not soak as good as after few uses but it soaked water instantly very well for the first use. Also this was very easy and convenient to use. Would definitely recommend it. Oh yes, we tried it on a hardwood floor! Look wise it’s again 👍
customer_reviews.author: Subhankar

customer_reviews.title: Nice broom
customer_reviews.text: Our entire house is hard wood, and this is our favorite broom. We have to sweep multiple times a day. It is also easy to take the cover off and throw in the washer.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I like this mop is the second time I buy this mop and I love the handle on this one than my first one. Let’s me reach place I couldn’t before.
customer_reviews.author: Romelia Perez

customer_reviews.title: its a mop
customer_reviews.text: it mop, but it really doesn’t do the job if you trying to use it for a big clean up like moving in a new place and you just redo the hard and clean floors before you move in, stick with the swifter
customer_reviews.author: Stevienix

customer_reviews.title: O cedar dust mop
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dust mop I’ve ever owned. It does a great job and so easy to maneuver. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon G.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy swivel.
customer_reviews.text: So much better than the older model which doesn't have an adjustable rod that lets you shorten the length.
customer_reviews.author: DBN

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: Spray on cleaner, mop, then throw it in the washer, then break it down and store it....so easy!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Salerno

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: Used this mop/broom to clean my whole first floor this weekend. Thus far, it's holding up well and does a good job.
customer_reviews.author: DeathBeforeDecaf

customer_reviews.title: Handle doesn’t extend.
customer_reviews.text: The handle DOES NOT EXTEND! I’m very crafty and dexterous and I’ve tried everything and examined it closely. At the base, our handle attachment looks different than pictured on the box.
customer_reviews.author: DCarter

customer_reviews.title: sqeaky clean floors
customer_reviews.text: used this mop at my moms and had to buy it so wasy to clean and takes no time and the pad is washable...just don't dry in dryer the sticky pad stops attaching
customer_reviews.author: Olesya Klimovich

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for years but it finally gave out. This was a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way easier and cheaper than swiffer
customer_reviews.text: Love this mop! It works so much better than my swiffer. The spray radius is appropriate and I can mop my house much quicker.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: O- cedar duel action microfiber flip mop
customer_reviews.text: The mop arrived in the time frame promised it works great very easy to get under furniture great design I would reccomend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: bostonbk67

customer_reviews.title: You need this if you have wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Love the flip able and it goes all the way under your couch
customer_reviews.author: sandra fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love the larger size of this mop as covers wider area and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: BEST FOUND MOP IN MY LIFETIME
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest mop that I’ve ever used! I won’t ever purchase or recommend another brand! excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hall-Reed

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use convenient
customer_reviews.text: Vinyl floors and a shepherd puppy?? This is used multipple times a day!
customer_reviews.author: OHA1

customer_reviews.title: Great for my shedding dog
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for dog hair pick up!! It’s the best I have found so far
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this product. Easily picks up dirt from the floor and it’s easy to take off and wash. I love that it came with an extra slip on so that while one was washing, I could still use the other if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Zaidy

customer_reviews.title: Telescopic handle does not lock when extended
customer_reviews.text: Telescopic handle does not extend - so the product is literally useless
customer_reviews.author: SARAT

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me but I was surprised at how well it worked- much easier and better than other mops I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning a breeze with O-Cedar Dust Mop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these: one for myself and one for my friend that lives in the country. We both love this cleaning tool. We sing and dance around the floor cleaning-it is slim, glides over the floor, maneuvers easily over the floor and under furniture. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gambill

customer_reviews.title: Love it, it is a replacement for my older O Cedar Mop
customer_reviews.text: I just replaced my dry mop of 11 years. It's been great. I could not get any replacement parts because mine was so old. It was used nearly every day and I washed it all the time. I did not mind ordering a new one because this product is so well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Improved Handle!
customer_reviews.text: Wife likes the expandable handle, a big improvement over the previous fixed length handle.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: It’s just ok. Made with cheap plastic
customer_reviews.text: It’s not made very well. Cheap plastic coupler between the pole and dust mop. Hard to extend the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Aallen

customer_reviews.title: Fancy but not good
customer_reviews.text: This microfiber mop DOES NOT absord water easily and leaves streaks on our porcelain floors. We would prefer using a Swiffer or moist terry cloth instead of this mop.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pumarol

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I have used other products in the past, this is by far the best, easy to use and clean. With the wide head I’m able to clean a lot faster.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! You’ll love it!
customer_reviews.text: This flip mop makes it so quick and easy to keep my floors clean! It’s the perfect width and the telescopic handle makes getting under and around furniture a breeze. Quick wash in the machine and hang to dry. Super simple and eco-friendly too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G.

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: Just got all new vinyl floors in the kitchen and living room brought this to take care of them tried it today I love it
customer_reviews.author: JunkMan

customer_reviews.title: But only O-Cedar
customer_reviews.text: I love these. On hardwood floors they are a life saver!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Lee Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does not pick up dust/dog hair
customer_reviews.text: I should have kept with my old O-Cedar type dust mop. This one does not pick up or hold on to the dust and dog hair like my other one did, this one just pushes it around. Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy mop
customer_reviews.text: Great mop for cleaning my floors. Struggled at first to figure out how to extend the handle.
customer_reviews.author: KMAC

customer_reviews.title: Great dust mop
customer_reviews.text: i love this dust mop you can make handle shorter which is very convenient for my cleaning business because of putting in back of suv and of course its washable very good quality
customer_reviews.author: rhoda meza

customer_reviews.title: Great job
customer_reviews.text: Most convenient and useful mop for my hardwood and laminate floors. Have never had a mop that worked so well in my 65 years of keeping house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for absorbing puddles left on the mudroom floor following sledding with the grandchildren!
customer_reviews.author: Judi

customer_reviews.title: This product is great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had one and i had to get one for myself. We have dogs that shed constantly and year round. Makes cleaning actually fun.
customer_reviews.author: Nanacruz

customer_reviews.title: A must have for bamboo floors
customer_reviews.text: Really like this easy to use and works great easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Nice wide base and I can wash ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Nice wide base and I can wash it! YAY! It picked up dog hair and dust from my new construction home. <3
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this
customer_reviews.text: I have wood floors and a Shar-Pei, she has horrible allergies and sheds so much..we use this everyday.. makes cleaning so much easier. I love it
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: This product is great. It feels sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. It feels sturdy, I like the size and design. I'm guessing it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Conlee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and great price. I own rental properties & buy these mops for all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: O-Cedar Dual-Action Microfiber Flip Mop - A Great Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Great Dust Mop for any kind of floor (wood or vinyl). Gathers dust better than one could ask for...
customer_reviews.author: Nasty Jack Nasty

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. You would have to be 4' tall to use this gracefully.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Amador

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Pole didn’t extend. Difficult to use with such a short pole
customer_reviews.author: J. Trotter

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will not pick up dist. leaves a trail of dirt when pushing floor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dust trapper.
customer_reviews.text: Great for dust bunnies under the bed and fan blades
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable handle is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The mop works great but the adjustable handle does not. Ended up throwing the handle in the trash, and using an old broom handle because the mop handle wouldn't lock after multiple tries.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended. It flops and makes more of a mess than you’re trying to clean. Ordered it, then saw it a couple days later at Dollar General for $8. Not even worth that.
customer_reviews.author: Gburgnew

customer_reviews.title: ... have a laminate flooring in my hotel it works great and housekeepers are very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have a laminate flooring in my hotel it works great and housekeepers are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Bipin

customer_reviews.title: The best cleaner for high gloss floors
customer_reviews.text: I have a high gloss white floor and hate foot prints. I bought 4 different types of mops. I use my ocedar for wet spills and this dry to remove foot prints. I just love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Lake

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This mop is better than my previous mop which the pads kept coming off. The pads on this one don't fall off. Also, I like that it swivels nicely and is narrow enough to get into small areas.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely one of their better models
customer_reviews.text: Great dust mop but my pole doesn't like to stay extended. Besides that I got a spare mop head for it and does great for lightweight floor cleaning. Take that Swifter
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Combs

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Mops and cleans well. At first was confused, but now I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this mop, I have two mops and 2 extra replacement pads. Great for hard wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: lorine

customer_reviews.title: Came in quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for a couple of months and still have it. Works perfect for any kind of floors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I have tile and two Golden Retrievers, I use this daily, it catches so much hair and dirt.
customer_reviews.author: jeff schrah

product_meta.title: O-Cedar Dual-Action Microfiber Flip Mop
product_meta.description: Style:Flip MopThe unbeatable cleaning power & durability of microfiber this capable microfiber mop is made with ultra-dense chenille for efficient dry dusting and dirt pickup. On the other side, The scrubbing strips safely remove embedded dirt and give you twice the cleaning power. Use & care instructions: Use dry: attracts and holds dirt, dust and hair for a thorough clean. Use damp: cleans effectively without chemicals. To use damp, Mist the floor using a spray bottle or remove pad off of base, rinse and wring by hand, and re-attach. Pad is machine or hand washable up to 100 times. Lay flat to dry. For best results do not use bleach or fabric softener and make sure Velcro is attached before washing. Refills available. Change refill every three to six months for best results. Features a sturdy adjustable telescoping handle that extends up to 56 inches.
feature_bullets: Perfect for either wet or dry cleaning
Easily attracts dust, dirt and hair from hard surfaces. For best results, change refill every 3-6 months
This mop is great for hardwood floor cleaning and other surfaces like linoleum, tile and more
Compatible with the Dual-Action Microfiber Flip Mop Damp/Dry All-Surface Refill
